nodes.bodyText:
Works in the context where it's used, but it's odd. Drawing a parallel to strings, one normally checks if they are null or empty, e.g.: http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/apidocs/org/apache/commons/lang3/StringUtils.html#isEmpty-java.lang.CharSequence-
I would do the same here, the end result should not change, but the code is less surprising.
